text: 8.4: Wkp 14.1-32 naŋga, Mt 9.30 naŋga, Mk 5.43 naŋga, 7.36 naŋga, Lu 5.14 naŋga, 17.14Kamata Jisas nuŋ karikarita ambami, Uta kru mumɨŋgaŋ naŋ yɨvurahi vana nɨrɨm maŋambavarahanda. Uta kwɨrandɨmbɨsa nandɨ ha Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu hamaŋ isɨhurama. Kamata Mosesɨndu tɨkatɨka kuyu mɨŋahandata, Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu hɨm ŋgu. Kamatɨna Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu hama kɨrañɨŋgum. Kamatɨna kru muŋɨnɨŋ ŋgata ambɨrɨmandɨyu, Kandi lepra ha yɨwari, vamba ambɨrɨmandɨyu, vami.
